attributes.action: pay carers, per hour at the goverment set minimum wage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Carers, of relatives and others only receive a pitiful amount of carer’s allowance.  Some care for a minimum 35hrs pw, but most care for longer.  To qualify for CA you must provde care for min 35 hrs pw (a job in any other terms).  Carers should be treated fairly and justly, the amount of money saved by the government for the work we do, is not reflected by the payments we receive.
We derserve a living wage for this. 
It is disgracfull that we can be guilt tripped into accepting the level ef payment of CA.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
